name: Boxville Demo (itch)
description:
Boxville is a story game dedicated to fighting your stress and anxiety. It’s a 2D hand-drawn point and click adventure game full of quests, logic puzzles and aesthetic joy.

Boxville is the city of boxes populated with old cans. They live a quiet and happy life with their everyday routines and habits. But one day, something disturbed their idyll… This where our adventure begins.
